description: Friction surface used to map global accessibility to high-density urban centres at a resolution of 1×1 kilometre for 2015, as measured by travel time.
title: Friction Surface
citation: Weiss DJ., Nelson A., Gibson HS., Temperley WH., Peedell S., Lieber A., Hancher M., Poyart E., Belchior S., Fullman N., Mappin B., Dalrymple U., Rozier J., Lucas TCD., Howes RE., Tusting LS., Kang SY., Cameron E., Bisanzio D., Battle KE., Bhatt S., Gething PW., A global map of travel time to cities to assess inequalities in accessibility in 2015 Nature. January 2018 553: 333–336.
